name: mini chef's odyssey
description:
Help the mini chef to defeat horrifying and evil creatures....or is that right? 

It may not what it seems....

Controls: 

  • W A S D: move the mini chef
  • Mouse: point and click the left button to shoot

This game was made for the PodQuestJam 2021!

Credits:

Jessica Azambuja Moroszczuk

code and art

Lair Raupp

music e sfx

Special thanks to Jana Chumi (thanks for the support!)
